contents.text: Welcome to Industrial Light & Magic in San Francisco, the world’s leading visual effects facility.
For film and television visual effects services, press 1.
Please hold the line while we connect you with one of our VFX supervisors.

navigationGoals: Schedule a quick consultation to plan VFX work for my upcoming film project.
I want to discuss a new VFX approach for my documentary on veterans transitioning to civilian life.
Discuss a new VFX pipeline integration for my upcoming feature film.
I need help setting up a new film visual effects project and want to speak with a supervisor.
Schedule a consultation with a VFX supervisor to plan a new effects sequence for my student film demonstration

contents.text: For existing project status updates, press 2.
Please hold the line while we retrieve your project details.

navigationGoals: Get a status report on my current film project’s visual effects deliverables.
I need an update on the VFX progress for my short film about veteran mental health.
Check render farm utilization and shot completion status for my ongoing film VFX project.
I’d like to check the progress on my ongoing film VFX project.
Get an update on the current visual effects progress for my ongoing project

contents.text: For commercial production and attraction services, press 2.
For new commercial or attraction projects, press 1.
Please hold the line while we connect you with our creative services team.

navigationGoals: Discuss starting a new VFX campaign for our upcoming commercial.
I'm looking to produce a new PSA commercial on PTSD support for ex-military personnel.
Initiate a consultation for a new AR-based attraction leveraging real-time ray tracing.
I want to discuss launching a new commercial or attraction project with the creative team.
Discuss creative concepts for a science exhibit attraction’s visuals

contents.text: For technical support and post-production inquiries, press 2.
Please hold the line while we connect you with our support specialists.

navigationGoals: Resolve a technical issue with post-production files for my commercial ad.
I need technical assistance with post-production files for our veteran outreach video.
Get assistance configuring ACES color management for my CG renders in post-production.
I need technical support and post-production advice for my recent commercial project.
Troubleshoot export settings and file formats with the VFX support team
